tag_list: marketing, online-marketing, climbing, slackline, telemark-skiing, advertising, werbung, werbeagentur
overview:
Philipp Schade started in 2001 at BBDO interactive Dubai his carreer in online marketing. As a projectmanager he worked on projects for national an international clients like Emirates Airlines, Deutsche Telekom, Adidas and Mercedes Benz. Since 2003 he is working with Flip Media the biggest online agency in the middle east. In 2006 he started his own company Agentur Schade where he is still CEO.

Besides working he enjoys travelling, exploring new projects, cycling, climbing and telemark skiing.
